name: Athletics
description: This Talent represents your basic athletic ability, as well as any training you might have had in sports or other rigorous activities. Athletics concerns all forms of running, jumping, throwing, swimming, sports, and the like. However, Athletics doesnâ€™t cover basic motor actions such as lifting weights, nor does it govern athletic feats covered by another Ability (such as Melee).
possessedBy: Athletes, Hobbyists, Park Rangers, Jocks, Kids
specialties: Swimming, Rock Climbing, Acrobatics, Dancing, Parkour, specific sports
